appName: Glider Sim - Hang Gliding / Paragliding Simulator

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: Glider Sim - Hang Gliding / Paragliding Simulator
display_name: Glider Sim - Hang Gliding / Paragliding Simulator
display_long_description:
**Gliders Included:** Paraglider, Paramotor-Trike, Mini-Wing, Speedwing, Hang Glider, Ultralight Trike, FPV Racing Drone, and Spectator Cam. 

**Base Package Includes:**

- Sun Valley, USA
- Walenstadt, Switzerland (Swiss Alps)
- Grand Teton, USA

Each map is crafted from real-world satellite imagery and enhanced with high-resolution textures and lush vegetation. Choose from hundreds of launch points.

**Optional Upgrade to Earth Online Plus - 30 Day Trial** : Expand the simulator to fly anywhere on Earth powered by Google Earth Photorealistic Tiles. Purchase of an access pass required after trial. $3 USD / Month or $17 USD / year. 

**Dynamic Weather System:** Customize wind direction and strength, as well as time of day. The sun angle and terrain dynamically influence thermal activity and cloud formation. Toggle wind particles on / off to visualize thermals and ridge lift! 

**Advanced Flight Physics:** Each cell of your glider is simulated with soft-body physics, allowing for maneuvers like wingovers, spirals, stalls, and swoops. Stay vigilant to prevent your paraglider from collapsing mid-flight!

**Challenges:** Test your skills with Scored Challenges on each map. Compete in Speed Flying challenges, Cross Country (XC) Races, and more. Monthly leaderboards let you see how you stack up against pilots worldwide.

**Single Player / Multiplayer:** Enjoy solo flights in Single Player mode or join friends and other pilots in Multiplayer mode. Connect on the community Discord to organize flights and competitions!
